listitem.para: A data structure with type T_OPTDATA containing at least the following fields.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: The optimbase_outstruct function returns a data structure with T_OPTDATA type. This data structure contains basic optimization fields.

The output argument data is designed to be the input of the optimbase_outputcmd function which, in turn, calls back the output function. This data structure may be enriched by children (specialized) optimization methods.
